casebody.data:
No. 10-440. Manuel Kramer, Petitioner v. Zoning Board of Appeals of Somerville, Massachusetts, et al. 562 U.S. 1091, 131 S. Ct. 796,

178 L. Ed. 2d 531,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 9483. December 6, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the Appeals Court of Massachusetts denied.

Same case below, 76 Mass. App. 1126, 925 N.E.2d 572.
